Name: Joseph
SkillDescription[2]: ATK +5

Name: Speer
SkillDescription[2]: ATK +10
SkillDescription[4]: HP +50

Name: Modell
SkillDescription[2]: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 3% when attacking enemies within 2m.
SkillDescription[4]: Extra DMG Reduction increases by 3% when attacked by enemies within 2m.

Name: Hermann
SkillDescription[2]: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 3% when attacking enemies farther than 3m.
SkillDescription[4]: Extra DMG Reduction increases by 3% when attacked by enemies farther than 3m.

Name: Archimedes
SkillDescription[2]: Basic Attack DMG increases by 5%.
SkillDescription[4]: In every 10s, the next Basic Attack increases Basic Attack DMG by 10% for 4s.

Name: Edison
SkillDescription[2]: Signal Orb skill DMG increases by 5%.
SkillDescription[4]: After a 3-Ping, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 5% for 5s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Alice
SkillDescription[2]: Healing effect increases by 5%.
SkillDescription[4]: Healing increases the target's Physical DMG and Elemental DMG by 4% for 4s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Cunningham
SkillDescription[2]: Physical and Elemental DMG increase by 5% when attacking enemies with Super Armor.
SkillDescription[4]: If being attacked multiple times within 5s, gain a shield that reduces the next DMG taken by 30%. 5s cooldown.

Name: Anderia
SkillDescription[2]: When attacking, has a 20% chance to call an artillery strike, each shell dealing 40% Physical DMG to the target. 15s cooldown.

Name: Nimitz
SkillDescription[2]: Basic Attack DMG increases by 5%.
SkillDescription[4]: Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Ping is increased by 5%.
SkillDescription[6]: After an Entrance Skill, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 10% for 8s.

Name: Erwin
SkillDescription[2]: Basic Attack DMG increases by 10%.
SkillDescription[4]: Basic Attack DMG increases by 15% without being attacked. 12s cooldown starts when taking a hit.

Name: Aife
SkillDescription[2]: For each orb pinged, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 2% for 3s. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
SkillDescription[4]: Enters Matrix upon a 3-Ping. 60s cooldown.

Name: Ike
SkillDescription[2]: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 2% and Elemental DMG increases by 4%.
SkillDescription[4]: When dealing Elemental DMG, you have a 15% chance to inflict Burn, Electrocute, Frost, and Corruption depending on the element. Lasts 5 seconds and has an 8 second cooldown on the same unit.

Name: Voltaire
SkillDescription[2]: Attacks reduce the target's DEF by 10% for 5s. 12s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: When taking damage, reduces the attacker's Physical DEF by 15% for 7s. Can be stacked up to 2 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Gloria
SkillDescription[2]: Attacks reduce the target's all Elemental Resistance by 6% for 5s. 12s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: When taking damage, reduces the Elemental Resistance of enemies within 5m by 6% for 7s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Richelieu
SkillDescription[2]: Healing effect increases by 5%. Next healing effect increases the target's Physical DMG by 8% for 4s. 5s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: Gains a random Signal Orb for every 8 orbs pinged. 5s cooldown.

Name: Samantha
SkillDescription[2]: Healing effect increases by 5%. Next healing effect increases the target's Elemental DMG by 8% for 4s. 5s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: The next healing effect adds an elemental aura that increases the Elemental DMG and Elemental Resistance of the allies in the area by 8% and 5% respectively. 10s cooldown.

Name: Mozart
SkillDescription[2]: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15% when in Matrix.
SkillDescription[4]: Deals 200% damage to all enemies on screen when you enter Matrix.

Name: Boudica
SkillDescription[2]: Basic Attack DMG increases by 7%.
SkillDescription[4]: All DMG dealt and Movement Speed are increased by 5% and 10% when in Matrix.
SkillDescription[6]: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 3% upon dealing DMG. It can only be triggered once per 2s. Stacks up to 5 times until taking DMG.

Name: Liv: Reindeer
SkillDescription[2]: Signal Orb skill's Extra DMG Bonus and healing effect increase by 5%.
SkillDescription[4]: Attacks have a 20% chance to drop Christmas gifts next to the enemy. Picking up a gift restores 5 Energy and increases Extra DMG Bonus by 5% for 5s. 10s cooldown.

Name: New Year Fireworks
SkillDescription[2]: ATK increases by 5%. For every 3 Red Orbs pinged, summons 4 red packets that deal 10% Fire DMG when they touch the enemy. Lasts 10s. 30s cooldown.

Name: Lantern Festival: Reunion
SkillDescription[2]: After performing a 3-Ping or QTE skill, releases a lantern to follow the character on field, increasing the ATK and Movement Speed of nearby allies by 7% for 15s. 30s cooldown.

Name: KFC·Alpha
SkillDescription[2]: A QTE or 3-Ping has a 50% chance to drop a bucket of chicken. 30s cooldown. The bucket disappears in 10s. Picking it up will increase Movement Speed by 12% for 15s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: KFC·Lucia
SkillDescription[2]: A QTE or 3-Ping has a 50% chance to drop a chicken burger. 30s cooldown. The chicken burger disappears in 10s. Picking it up grants 8 energy.

Name: Condelina
SkillDescription[2]: Basic Attack DMG increases by 15%
SkillDescription[4]: Basic Attacks have a 25% chance to go berserk, increasing the Extra Damage of Basic Attack by 15% and CRIT Rate by 5% for 5s. 8s cooldown.

Name: Shakespeare
SkillDescription[2]: All ATK increases by 3% and Fire DMG increases by 7%.
SkillDescription[4]: Attacks have a 50% chance to inflict Burn for 5s. When attacking a burning enemy, there is a 20% chance to cause an explosion, dealing 100% Fire DMG. 5s cooldown. Burn: Reduces the target's Fire Resistance by 8% and deals 12% Fire DMG per second. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Heisen
SkillDescription[2]: All ATK increases by 3% and Lightning DMG increases by 7%.
SkillDescription[4]: Attacks have a 25% chance to trigger Thunderstorm within 3.5m. Thunderstorm electrocutes the target for 5s. 5s cooldown. Attacking an electrocuted enemy has a 20% chance to trigger lightning chain damage. 8s cooldown. Lightning Chain: All electrocuted targets take 250% Lightning DMG. Thunderstorm: 100% Lightning DMG. Electrocute: Lightning Resistance is reduced by 8%.

Name: Darwin
SkillDescription[2]: For each orb pinged, Extra DMG Bonus increases by 3% for 4s. Can be stacked up to 5 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
SkillDescription[4]: Records the color of Signal Orbs pinged. When all 3 colors are recorded, unleashes a 12m shockwave that deals 600% Physical DMG and resets the record.

Name: Hanna
SkillDescription[2]: Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Ping is increased by 25%.
SkillDescription[4]: For every 30s, enters Matrix upon a 3-Ping and gains a random Signal Orb.

Name: Cottie
SkillDescription[2]: Gains 20% more Energy when pinging an orb. Signature Move requires 20% less Energy.
SkillDescription[4]: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 15% for 10s when performing a Signature Move. Gains Super Armor that increases Extra DMG Reduction by 20% for 5s after the Signature Move. Both duration will reset every time it is triggered.

Name: Da Vinci
SkillDescription[2]: When QTE is triggered, the controlling character gains 10% ATK and 20% DEF for 8s. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
SkillDescription[4]: When QTE is triggered, triggers another character's QTE. 8s cooldown. If there are 3 characters on the field, ATK is increased by 20%.

Name: Catherine
SkillDescription[2]: QTE and 3-Ping skills reduce the target's Physical DEF by 20% for 8s. 10s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: When taking damage, gains a shield that absorbs damage equal to 20% of own DEF, as well as increasing the Physical DMG dealt by 15% for 5s. 8s cooldown.

Name: Einsteina
SkillDescription[2]: QTE and 3-Ping skills reduce the target's corresponding Elemental Resistance by 15% for 8s. 10s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: When taking damage, releases an elemental aura, gaining Elemental Resistance equal to 5% + 1% of own DEF for 5s. Elemental DMG dealt increases by 15% when the aura is present. 8s cooldown.

Name: Philip II
SkillDescription[2]: Healing effect increases by 10%. Next healing effect increases the target's Physical DMG by 10% and DEF by 10% for 5s. 8s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: A healing drone will be charged when healing is performed. When fully charged, the next time you performing healing will consume all charged energy to summon the healing drone. It will follow an ally with the lowest HP percentage, healing allies in a 5m radius for 2% maximum HP per second and increasing their Physical DMG by 15% for 5s. 12s cooldown.

Name: Guinevere
SkillDescription[2]: Heals for 10% more. Increases the Elemental DMG and Resistances of the healing target by 10% for 5 seconds. Has a cooldown of 8 seconds.
SkillDescription[4]: A healing drone will be charged when healing is performed. When fully charged, the next time you performing healing will consume all charged energy to summon the healing drone. It will follow an ally with the lowest HP percentage, healing allies in a 5m radius for 2% maximum HP per second and increasing their Elemental ATK by 15% for 5s. 12s cooldown.

Name: Frederick
SkillDescription[2]: Each dodge increases Movement Speed by 15% and Extra DMG Bonus by 5% for 5s. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
SkillDescription[4]: The next dodge reduces the attacker's speed by 20% and Extra DMG Reduction by 15% for 4s. 8s cooldown.

Name: Bathlon
SkillDescription[2]: ATK increases by 3% and Dark DMG increases by 7%
SkillDescription[4]: Dealing DMG has a 20% chance to summon a Dark Zone that lasts 5s. 5s cooldown. The Dark Zone will inflict Corruption on the targets within it for 3s. Attacking a Corrupted target has a 20% chance to gain 1 random Signal Orb. 12s cooldown. Corruption: Deals 80% Dark DMG every 2s and reduces Dark Resistance by 8%.

Name: Patton
SkillDescription[2]: CRIT Rate and Physical DMG increase by 5%.
SkillDescription[4]: Each time you deal Physical DMG, if it is not a CRIT Hit, the CRIT Rate of the next Physical DMG increases by 2%, stacking up to a maximum of 20%. This effect is reset when you deal a CRIT Hit. CRIT Hit increases Physical DMG by 5% for 3s. Can be stacked up to 3 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Zu Wenyuan
SkillDescription[2]: ATK increases by 3% and Ice DMG increases by 7%
SkillDescription[4]: 30% chance to cause Frost for 5s while attacking. When attacking targets with Frost, there is a 20% chance to trigger Ice Explosion to deal 420% Ice DMG within 3m from the target and apply Frost. This effect has a 8s cooldown. Frost: Reduces target's Movement Speed by 20% and Ice Resistance by 8%.

Name: Koya
SkillDescription[2]: Extra DMG increases by 10%.
SkillDescription[4]: Gains 20% energy when switched in. Signal Orb Skill DMG increases by 10% while a shield exists.
SkillDescription[6]: When Camu: Crocotta is Berserk, increases Damage Dealt by 10% and Speed by 20%. Ping Skills that deal damage also inflict Fear for the duration of Berserk.Fear: Reduces ATK DMG by 10% and deals an additional 10% ATK DMG to the target.

SkillDescription[2]: Reduces Extra DMG Bonus by 15% and Extra DMG Reduction by 30%.
SkillDescription[4]: Lose 5% of maximum HP every 5s.

Name: Memory Enhancer
SkillDescription[2]: Reduces Extra DMG Bonus by 15% and Extra DMG Reduction by 30%.
SkillDescription[4]: Lose 5% of maximum HP every 5s.

Name: Straylight Terminal
SkillDescription[2]: Movement Speed +10%
SkillDescription[4]: 会心率が3%上昇、物理ダメージが2%上昇

Name: Lucia - Summer Daze
SkillDescription[2]: Basic Attack DMG increases by 10%.
SkillDescription[4]: After any 3-Ping, randomly gain one of the below effects for 3s. 4s cooldown. Wild Rocker: All DMG increases by 7%. Soothing Chord: Receives a shield equal to 15% of your Defense. The shield refreshes when this effect is triggered again.

Name: Liv-Ceremony
SkillDescription[2]: When taking damage, gains a shield equal to 20% of own maximum HP for 5s. 30s cooldown.
SkillDescription[4]: Gain a healing effect equal to 15% of own maximum HP for every 20s.
